issue.title: recursive_directory_iterator effects refers to non-existent functions

discussion.p: operator++/increment, second bullet item, ¶39 says "Otherwise if recursion_pending() && is_directory(this->status()) && (!is_symlink(this->symlink_status())..." but recursive_directory_iterator does not have status or symlink_status members.
